name: shadowbox
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to fight an imaginary enemy by hitting the air with your hands
UK to pretend to argue about or deal with a problem, often to avoid dealing with the most important problem: The main political parties are merely shadowboxing, instead of tackling the real economic problems facing this country.
